description: men wearing coats and hats, seated and standing, around a building; two large text panels hang to right of doorway; same image as L2005.98.34
marks: Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Stamp and Lab on back, in pencil: [1967 JERUSALEM, ISRAEL / VINT
title: Jerusalem, Mea Shearim is the Hassidic Jewish quarter of the city, a place of prayer.  The signs give sayings from the Bible.
